TopicTitle: How to build your own MechJeb

Articles.Content: This is why I have no ethical problems with running mechjeb.
The video, while interesting, is not about KSP itself, and therefore the thread has been moved to off-topic lounge. Thanks for posting it, though.

+1 for merlinux. I agree.

Even Mercury had guidance in the missile and a sequencer in the capsule.
That computer was mind boggling high tech at that time. The moon missions where the reason integrated circuits where invented.
agc simulators exist. its a weird beast to operate.

And to think there were people who were willing to be launched into outer space guided by half analogue, slow electromechanical stuff monitored in real time by an army of nerds with slide rules, pen and paper...
